column5: Anybody know of a decent place to get a line in the water in the Oakville area? I will be visiting inlaws and wouldn't mind getting out early on Sunday: shore or river. Can I bribe anyone with some trout or walleye jigs?

The Bronte creek pier is an option. Here is a link to a camera view out of Bronte harbour.  http://lakevision.net/index.html  Just click on the camera map then choose the great lakes camera you wish to view. Bronte is the only Canadian camera offered.
I think he made it...  he's fishing off the end beside the lighthouse ! lol  Nope.. minute later and they're leaving! Someone forgot to set the clock ahead an hour tooo.
